main event: A father and son reported seeing one object similar to a basketball, yellow in color, moving up and down in the sky for fifty minutes.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on 29 February 1956,The object appeared to be about 2 feet in diameter,The object was moving in the SW quadrant of the sky, The sighting lasted for fifty minutes, The conclusion of the report indicated insufficient data for evaluation but suggested it could possibly be a balloon or aircraft.
sighted object: one yellow object similar to a basketball
